verbose_text: In order to further clarify the pathogenic mechanism of the HBx gene in HBVGN and the role of JAK / STAT signaling pathway activation in renal tubular epithelial cell apoptosis, we conducted a correlation analysis of renal tubular epithelial cell apoptosis and HBx expression in renal biopsy tissues of 22 patients with HBVGN.
evidence: STAT signaling pathway activation in renal tubular epithelial cell apoptosis
